Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is a modern detached production/manufacturing building of steel frame construction with profile metal clad elevations under a pitched metal clad roof. Speke is located approximately 8.6 miles (13.8 km) south-east of Liverpool city centre on the north bank of the Mersey. The area is served by Speke Boulevard, (A561 dual-carriageway), which is the main southern gateway into Liverpool, as well as giving access to the M62 (via the A562 and A5300). The property is located in a very prominent position with frontage to Speke Hall Road, which is the principal route from Speke Boulevard (A561) to Liverpool John Lennon Airport. A Holiday Inn Express hotel is situated adjacent to the unit. Speke’s proximity to the communications network, ports and thriving workforce of Liverpool has allowed it to become a major industrial, manufacturing and business location for the North West of England. Local occupiers include Littlewoods, Dobbies Garden Centres, Classic Couverture, HBOS, DHL, National Blood Centre,
Riverside Housing Association as well as a 4-star Marriott hotel, David Lloyd Leisure Centre and New Mersey Shopping Park.

Triumph Business Park is a 60 acres (24.281 hectares) major storage / distribution / commercial environment strategically located close to Liverpool John Lennon Airport and comprises approximately 800,000 sq ft (74,322 sq m) of business space in a secure environment. The Park has 24-hour access with a security lodge and barrier at the entrance. Triumph Business Park Is located close to both the M62 & M56 motorways and less than 1 mile from Liverpool John Lennon Airport.

The Park has 24-hour access with a security lodge and barrier at the entrance Triumph Business Park Is located close to both the M62 & M56 motorways and less than 1 mile from Liverpool John Lennon Airport

Triumph Business Park is a 60 acres (24.281 hectares) major storage / distribution / commercial environment strategically located close to Liverpool John Lennon Airport and comprises approximately 800,000 sq ft (74,322 sq m) of business space in a secure environment. The Park has 24-hour access with a security lodge and barrier at the entrance. Triumph Business Park Is located close to both the M62 & M56 motorways and less than 1 mile from Liverpool John Lennon Airport.

Triumph Business Park is a 60 acres (24.281 hectares) major storage /distribution / commercial environment strategically located close to Liverpool John Lennon Airport and comprises approximately 800,000 sq ft (74,322 sq m) of business space in a secure environment. The Park has 24-hour access with a security lodge and barrier at the entrance. Nearby key local amenities include the expanding Liverpool John Lennon Airport. Liverpool South Parkway transport interchange is 1 mile to the North and provides a choice of destinations all over Merseyside with links to Birmingham and
London Euston. There are various thriving retail communities in the area including Mersey Retail Park with major high street names such as Marks & Spencer. M&S Simply Food, B&Q & Next amongst others. Triumph Business Park is located less than 1 mile from Liverpool John Lennon Airport and within 25 miles of Manchester International Airport.
